quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma, which is living with the results of other people's thinking.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: You become what you believe.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Life is trying things to see if they work.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.text: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Just doing as well as you did last time is not good enough.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson
